snippet: A Texas judge ordered the guardrail maker to pay additional civil penalties and a whistle-blower’s lawyers’ fees in a judgment stemming from a fraud case last year.
abstract: Federal Judge Rodney Gilstrap issues $663 million judgment against Trinity Industries in suit over deadly flaws in company's guardrails; jury found company liable for defrauding the Federal Highway Administration.

byline.original: By AARON M. KESSLER and DANIELLE IVORY

lead_paragraph: A Texas judge ordered the guardrail maker to pay additional civil penalties and a whistle-blower’s lawyers’ fees in a judgment stemming from a fraud case last year.

headline.main: $663 Million in Penalties for Maker of Guardrail
headline.print_headline: $663 Million in Penalties for Maker of Guardrail
